title: Recommendations (door hanger)
body:
This issue covers implementing the first iteration of @raymak's contextual feature recommendation as an action. 

**Blocked by:**
- [ ] UI Treatment study to determine the UX for how we want to present recommendations.

## Notes
- Possibly wait for UI form testing to see if door hanger is ready
- Need to meet with kamyar about minimum contextual triggers
- Need to figure out how to not accidentally identify users by getting results of a recommendation
  - Going to meet with glind about ways to avoid this
- Need to handle rate-limiting and queuing recommendations so users are not overloaded.
